definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: Baltimore's rate of lymphoma is among the nation's highest.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩的淋巴癌病發率在整個國家中是最高的。

sentences.english: Then one weekend I went back to Baltimore.
sentences.chinese: 一個週末，我回到了巴爾的摩。

sentences.english: Many in Baltimore believe he was beaten by local criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩的許多人認爲他被當地的犯罪團伙毆打了。

sentences.english: Dunn was the manager of the Baltimore Orioles minor league baseball team.
sentences.chinese: 鄧恩是巴爾的摩金鶯小聯盟棒球隊的經理。

sentences.english: In 2009, Baltimore implemented its own trans-fat ban.
sentences.chinese: 2009年，巴爾的摩實現其自身的反式脂肪的禁令。

sentences.english: A sanguinary encounter seemed daily imminent between the two parties in the street of Baltimore .
sentences.chinese: 雙方隨時可能在巴爾的摩大街上掐住對方的脖子。

sentences.english: Americans successfully defended the fort against a British attack. The Battle of Baltimore was a turning point in the war that began two years earlier.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩戰役是1812年美英戰爭的轉折點。

sentences.english: He said the Baltimore Orioles team would pay George six hundred dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他說，巴爾的摩金鶯隊喬治將支付六百元。

sentences.english: The University of Baltimore is offering the opportunity to study zombies as part of ‘English 333’.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩大學開設了一門語言課程，專門研究殭屍。

sentences.english: The train speeds past a home between Wilmington and Baltimore.
sentences.chinese: 火車在新威明頓與巴爾的摩之間的一個村莊飛馳而過。

sentences.english: He will show the woman around Baltimore.
sentences.chinese: 他將領女士參不雅觀巴爾的摩。

sentences.english: Dickstein says it's the only kosher donut shop in Baltimore.
sentences.chinese: 迪克斯坦說，這是隻有在巴爾的摩猶太甜甜圈店。
